data.name: CreateImHouseholdMbrMnthlyAdj1
CreateImHouseholdMbrMnthlyAdj2
ReadCsePerson
data.value: select distinct T1.NUMB from CKT_CSE_PERSON T1 join CKT_IM_HH_MBR_MSUM T2 on (T1.NUMB = T2.CSP_NUMBER) and (@imhAeCaseNo = T2.IMH_AE_CASE_NO) and ( (T2.YEAR0 < @year0) or ( (T2.YEAR0 = @year0) and (T2.MONTH0 <= @month0) ) ) order by T1.NUMB

data.name: ReadImHouseholdMbrMnthlySum1
data.value: select top(1) sum(GRANT_AMT) from CKT_IM_HH_MBR_MSUM with(readuncommitted) where (@imhAeCaseNo = IMH_AE_CASE_NO) and (YEAR0 <= @year0) and ( ( (MONTH0 < @month0) and (YEAR0 = @year0) ) or (YEAR0 < @year0) )

data.name: ReadImHouseholdMbrMnthlySum2
data.value: select top(1) sum(GRANT_AMT) from CKT_IM_HH_MBR_MSUM with(readuncommitted) where (@imhAeCaseNo = IMH_AE_CASE_NO) and (@cspNumber = CSP_NUMBER) and (YEAR0 <= @year0) and ( ( (MONTH0 < @month0) and (YEAR0 = @year0) ) or (YEAR0 < @year0) )

data.name: ReadImHouseholdMbrMnthlySum3
data.value: select YEAR0, MONTH0, RELATIONSHIP, GRANT_AMT, GRANT_MED_AMT, URA_AMOUNT, URA_MEDICAL_AMOUNT, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TMST, LAST_UPDATED_BY, LAST_UPDATED_TMST, IMH_AE_CASE_NO, CSP_NUMBER from CKT_IM_HH_MBR_MSUM where (@imhAeCaseNo = IMH_AE_CASE_NO) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber) and ( (YEAR0 < @year0) or ( (YEAR0 = @year0) and (MONTH0 < @month0) ) ) order by YEAR0, MONTH0

data.name: ReadProgramCheckpointRestart
data.value: select top(1) PROGRAM_NAME, UPDATE_FREQUENCY_C, READ_FREQUENCY_COU, CHECKPOINT_COUNT, LST_CHKPNT_TMST, RESTART_IND, RESTART_INFO from CKT_PGM_CHKPNT_RST where PROGRAM_NAME = 'SWEFBFXG'

data.name: ReadUraAdjustmentImHouseholdMemberImHousehold
data.value: select IDENTIFIER, ADJ_YEAR, ADJ_MONTH, ADJ_ADC_GRANT, ADJ_PASSTHRU, ADJ_MED_ASSIST, ADJ_FC_GRANT, ADJ_HURA, ADJ_REASON, CREATED_BY, CREATED_TSTAMP, CSP_NUMBER, IMH_AE_CASE_NO, IHM_START_DATE, ADJ_MEDI_URA from CKT_URA_ADJ with(readuncommitted) where (ADJ_HURA < 0) and (IMH_AE_CASE_NO >= @imhAeCaseNo) order by IMH_AE_CASE_NO, CSP_NUMBER, IHM_START_DATE, IDENTIFIER

data.name: UpdateImHouseholdMbrMnthlySum
data.value: update CKT_IM_HH_MBR_MSUM set URA_AMOUNT = @uraAmount, LAST_UPDATED_BY = @lastUpdatedBy, LAST_UPDATED_TMST = @lastUpdatedTmst where (YEAR0 = @year0) and (MONTH0 = @month0) and (IMH_AE_CASE_NO = @imhAeCaseNo) and (CSP_NUMBER = @cspNumber)

data.name: UpdateProgramCheckpointRestart1
data.value: update CKT_PGM_CHKPNT_RST set LST_CHKPNT_TMST = @lstChkpntTmst, RESTART_IND = @restartInd, RESTART_INFO = @restartInfo where PROGRAM_NAME = @programName

data.name: UpdateProgramCheckpointRestart2
data.value: update CKT_PGM_CHKPNT_RST set LST_CHKPNT_TMST = @lstChkpntTmst, RESTART_IND = @restartInd, RESTART_INFO = @restartInfo where PROGRAM_NAME = @programName
